stimulusHtml:
Directions: Respond to all parts of the question. It is suggested that you take a few minutes to plan and outline each answer. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.

Voter participation and voter behavior in elections are affected by a number of factors.

  1. Describe the effect of each of the following on the level of voter participation in elections.

    • The voter registration requirement

    • Lack of penalties for not voting

    • Ballot fatigue

  2. Describe the effect of each of the following on voter behavior in elections.

    • Race 

    • Party identification

    • Geographic regions
